title: FingerprintsDoor
body:
<<thinkingFont Dialogue>>
The door has been used multiple times.
I should still check for fingerprints.
[[Dust for prints on the outside|FingerprintsDoor.DustOut]]
[[Dust for prints on the inside|FingerprintsDoor.DustIn]]
[[Actually, I want to go back downstairs|FingerprintsDoor.Leave]]
[[Maybe Later|FingerprintsDoor.Exit]]

title: FingerprintsDoor.DustOut
body:
There are so many different prints here..
I count at least 20 different sets..
[[Record them all anyway. It might be useful|fingerprintsDoor.Exit]]
[[A waste of time..|fingerprintsDoor.Exit]]

title: FingerprintsDoor.DustIn
body:
There are four sets of prints here.
<<set $fingerprintsFound to true>>
<<set $foundClues to true>>
[[fingerprintsDoor.Exit]]
<<if $foundSuspects is true and $foundClues is true>>
    <<set $CanTravel to true>>
<<endif>>
